p: Vero cells were seeded into a 96-well culture plate at a concentration of 2 × 10 4 cells per well. Next day, the medium was removed and the 96-well plates were replaced with media containing the serially diluted compounds, and the cells were further incubated for 48 hrs. The culture medium was removed and washed with 1 × PBS. The next step was conducted by antiviral activity assay described above. To calculate the CC 50 values, the results were transformed to percentage of controls and the CC 50 values were graphically obtained from the dose-response curves.
